Text: footy, thanks very much - the best, as always. And now you have uploaded HD in pretty much the same file size as before - file size, all important to me for download time, as the internet here is sooo slow! Cheers, one happy (English) ex-pat!

Footy, very grateful for this BBC upload (much better than the awful Sky F1). 

Quick question: these files and the first two practice session's sound doesn't work when played through my PS3 (sound works fine on my PC). Any ideas as to why this is happening? I've never had a problem with MP4 files. Any help would be appreciated.
thank you so much once again footy. bbc all the way
